title: Bug 103963: No Friendly Error Message When No Data for Series
description: The system does not display a friendly error message when there is no data for a series.
OB: When attempting to preview, no friendly error message is provided.
EB: If there is no data for a series, the system should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Attempt to preview a series with no data.
